sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves a list of persistent disks contained within the specified zone.

Inputs:

  • Project ID - Unique ID of the project.
  • Zone - Name of the zone.

Outputs:

  • Disk- JSON object contains disks Label and Name.
  • Status -If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Teams, Status is set to “Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Invalid Project ID has been passed.
  • Invalid authorization header. The access token you're using is either expired or invalid.

To use this action, a corresponding Google Persistent Disk connection and credential must be created and associated with the Google Persistent Disk Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: List Disks

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves a list of persistent disks contained within the specified zone.

Inputs:

  • Project ID - Unique ID of the project.
  • Zone - Name of the zone.

Outputs:

  • Disk- JSON object contains disks Label and Name.
  • Status -If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Teams, Status is set to “Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Invalid Project ID has been passed.
  • Invalid authorization header. The access token you're using is either expired or invalid.

To use this action, a corresponding Google Persistent Disk connection and credential must be created and associated with the Google Persistent Disk Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.name: List Disks
